de.tarent.telekom.cot.mqtt.util

Class JsonHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tarent.telekom.cot.mqtt.util.JsonHelper

  • public class JsonHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper classes for handling JsonObject key value pairs. Including but not limited to: converting a given Properties to a complete JsonObject, setting default values for a key value pair, checking key existence, etc.

      (String) Key for the initial password for the bootstrapping process, which will in turn be used to encode the actual password.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject from(java.util.Properties prop)
      Converts the given Properties into a JsonObject as simple key value pairs.
      static int getQoSValue(io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject msg)
      Returns an integer value based on the given JsonObject message value of QoS.
      static boolean getSslValue(io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject msg)
      Returns the correct SSL value based on what the "ssl" key value is in the JsonObject given.
      static void setSslOptions(io.vertx.mqtt.MqttClientOptions options, io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject msg)
      Sets the options for SSL by first checking if SSL is set to true and then checking if a key store path and password were given.

    • Method Detail

      • from

        public static io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject from(java.util.Properties prop)
        Converts the given Properties into a JsonObject as simple key value pairs. All values are used as Strings.
        Parameters:
        prop - the Properties to convert
        Returns:
        the converted JsonObject

      • getQoSValue

        public static int getQoSValue(io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject msg)
        Returns an integer value based on the given JsonObject message value of QoS.
        Parameters:
        msg - the JsonObject that might contain a "QoS" key value pair
        Returns:
        the value of the "QoS" key or 0 if any invalid values are given

      • getSslValue

        public static boolean getSslValue(io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject msg)
        Returns the correct SSL value based on what the "ssl" key value is in the JsonObject given.
        Parameters:
        msg - the JsonObject that might contain a "ssl" key value pair
        Returns:
        false if "ssl" is set to false, otherwise true

      • setSslOptions

        public static void setSslOptions(io.vertx.mqtt.MqttClientOptions options,
                                 io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject msg)
        Sets the options for SSL by first checking if SSL is set to true and then checking if a key store path and password were given.
        Parameters:
        options - the MqttClientOptions
        msg - The JsonObject message that contains the information we want to check
